definition: second of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/second in order/letter "B" or Roman "II" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/second party (in legal contract, usually 乙方[yi3 fang1], as opposed to 甲方[jia3 fang1])/ethyl/bent/winding/radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 5)/ancient Chinese compass point: 105°
turning stroke (in Chinese characters)/see also 折[zhe2]

sentences.english: The mentioned technology can be used for producing yttrium concentrate from ore leaching liquor.
sentences.chinese: 采用这项技术可以从矿石浸出液制备钇富集物。

sentences.english: Yet according to Cox, yttrium was not even listed in the report.
sentences.chinese: 但根据考克斯的说法，钇甚至没被列入这份报告之中。

sentences.english: Scientists at the YVO closely monitor the Yellowstone region for such precursors.
sentences.chinese: 在钒酸钇科学家密切留意这类前体黄石地区。

sentences.english: The stabilizing agent may include calcium, magnesium, yttrium salts of oxides and rare earth oxides.
sentences.chinese: 该稳定剂可能包括钙，镁，氧化物和稀土氧化物钇盐。

sentences.english: Determination of rare earth elements Cerium, Europium, Yttrium with DBC-chlorophosphonazo by solid phase spectrophotometry;
sentences.chinese: 偶氮氯膦固相光度法测定稀土元素铈，铕，钇。

sentences.english: Yttrium serves as an ideal non-magnetic diluent for the rare-earth metals.
sentences.chinese: 钇被用作稀土金属一种理想的非磁性稀释剂。

sentences.english: It suggests that rare-earth elements yttrium and praseodymium have certain genotoxicity.
sentences.chinese: 提示稀土元素钇和镨具有一定的遗传毒性。

sentences.english: Jiangxi Longyi Heavy Rare-earth Material CO. , Ltd is a high-tech enterprise and a innovation-based pilot enterprise in Jiangxi Province.
sentences.chinese: 龙钇公司是江西省高新技术企业，创新型试点企业。

sentences.english: The goal of this study is to explore the method of preparation YAG powder and the fluorescent character.
sentences.chinese: 研究了钇铝石榴石萤光粉的合成及其发光特性。

sentences.english: With scandium and yttrium, they make up the rare earth metals.
sentences.chinese: 加上钪和钇，一起组成稀土金属。

sentences.english: A soft silvery metallic element a rare earth of the lanthanide series it occurs in gadolinite monazite xenotime.
sentences.chinese: 一种软银色稀土属金属元素见于硅铍钇独居石磷钇中。
